strings.item:
Welcome to my online portfolio. My name is Marián Čepa (as you've probably already guessed). I'm 19 years old graphic designer from Slovakia. I've fallen in love with colors and curves about 4 years ago.

I'm more than 2in1! Fresh and modern webdesign? Animated banner? Creative poster or flyer? Cool t-shirts? Here we go! I'm available for freelancing!
I’d finished grammar school in Stropkov (SK) & started my ”design career” using nickname xmayo. After one-year experience I decided to create my own online portfolio.
Currently, I’m studying information technology at Brno University of Technology (CZ).

The odd times when I am not glued to my screen, I love doing sports, especially football, playing acoustic guitar, taking photos and listening to music. I’m a bit into chinese culture - taoism, tea and Wing Tsun.
